Lyric:
[by:LocoMofo]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.68]There is no combination of words
[00:02.45]I could put on the back of a postcard
[00:05.10]No song that I could sing
[00:06.79]But I can try for your heart
[00:09.61]Our dreams
[00:11.02]They are made out of real things
[00:13.31]Like a, shoebox of photographs
[00:15.42]With sepia-toned loving
[00:18.40]Love is the answer
[00:19.26]At least for most of the questions in my heart
[00:22.21]Like why are we here?
[00:23.67]And where do we go?
[00:24.72]And how come it's so hard?
[00:26.87]It's not always easy and
[00:27.83]Sometimes life can be deceiving
[00:31.17]I'll tell you one thing
[00:32.27]It's always better when we're together
[00:35.38]
[00:36.29]Mmm
[00:36.84]It's always better when we're together
[00:40.44]Yeah
[00:41.04]We'll look at the stars when we're together
[00:44.80]Well
[00:45.29]It's always better when we're together
[00:49.14]Yeah
[00:49.79]It's always better when we're together
[00:52.97]
[01:09.51]And all of these moments
[01:10.57]Just might find their way into my dreams tonight
[01:14.08]But I know that they'll be gone
[01:16.35]When the morning light sings
[01:18.15]And brings new things
[01:20.65]For tomorrow night you see
[01:22.96]That they'll be gone too
[01:24.61]Too many things I have to do
[01:26.77]But if all of these dreams might find their way
[01:29.28]Into my day to day scene
[01:31.45]I'd be under the impression
[01:33.57]I was somewhere in between
[01:35.42]With only two
[01:36.52]Just me and you
[01:37.72]Not so many things we got to do
[01:40.25]Or places we got to be
[01:41.86]We'll sit beneath the mango tree now
[01:45.11]
[01:45.91]Yeah
[01:46.27]it's always better when we're together
[01:49.99]Mmm
[01:50.64]we're somewhere in between together
[01:54.53]Well
[01:54.83]it's always better when we're together
[01:58.68]Yeah
[01:59.29]it's always better when we're together
[02:02.30]Mmm, mmm, mmm... 
[02:06.86]Mmm, mmm, mmm... 
[02:10.88]
[02:20.79]I believe in memories
[02:22.69]They look so, so pretty when I sleep
[02:27.29]Hey now, and when I wake up
[02:31.98]You look so pretty sleeping next to me
[02:35.94]But there is not enough time
[02:40.36]And there is no, no song I could sing
[02:44.29]And there is no combination of words I could say
[02:49.19]But I will still tell you one thing
[02:52.52]We're better together.
[02:55.60]
